verbs.description: [ARG0: Canada 's Foreign Affairs Minister Chrystia Freeland] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [V: responded] [ARG1: to attacks on Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau made by President Trump and his top advisers] , [ARGM-ADV: scolding the president and his team for their inappropriate conduct with other countries] .

Canada 's Foreign Affairs Minister Chrystia Freeland on Sunday responded to attacks on [ARG1: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [V: made] [ARG0: by President Trump and his top advisers] , scolding the president and his team for their inappropriate conduct with other countries .
